(% id="rechercher" class="block block-block clearfix" %) ((( [[image:Panels.SankoreSearchPanel@BGrechercher.png||width="81" class="block-icon"]] (% class="block-title" %) == The Sankoré search engine == (% class="block-contents-top" %) ((( {{html}} #template("advancedsearch.vm") {{/html}}
Sankore is an intelligent search engine to find, evaluate and share best teaching free digital resources (RNEL) Sankore in the database and more than 600 selected sites. ))) (% class="block-contents-bottom" %) ((( To share your digital resources and teaching through your favorite sites using Sankore plugin. [[Download the plugin Sankoré>>#||class="download-link"]] ))) )))
